resources.string: Highly dedicated, disciplined and versatile with dynamic ability to fit in any working environment. To gain practical experience and enhance my skills as a full stack developer through hands on training opportunities. Seeking to contribute to real-world projects, learn from industry professionals, and further develop my programming abilities. Committed to continuous learning and eager to contribute to success of a dynamic and innovative software development team

Programming Languages (Java, JavaScript, Python), Agile, Problem Solving, Adaptability, Interpersonal Skills, SQL, Firebase, Tableau, Maths, Microsoft Office, Business Analysis, HTML

Currently immersed in the dynamic world of Information Technology and Business Information Systems at Middlesex University. Embracing the cutting-edge curriculum, I gained advanced insights into the intersection of tech and business. Excited to leverage this knowledge to tackle real-world challenges and contribute meaningfully to the evolving digital landscape.

Successfully completed Aptechs comprehensive program, mastering the foundational aspects of programming. Armed with a solid understanding of core concepts, Im ready to navigate the digital landscape with confidence. Eager to apply my skills and embark on new coding adventures!
